topic.title: Deploy Yeastar Cloud PBX on AWS

ul.li: The VPC has two subnets, WAN subnet and LAN subnet
SBC instance has two ethernet ports, eth0 in WAN subnet, eth1 in LAN subnet.
Each YMP instance has one ethernet port eth0, the YMP ethernet ports are in LAN subnet.
SBC WAN (eth0) can receive data from the Internet and send data to the Internet.
SBC LAN (eth1) and YMP LAN (eth0) can initiate outbound connections to the Internet but prevent unsolicited inbound connections from the Internet.
